text:
Purchases by Army and
Air Force post exchanges and Navy exchanges for a variety of reasons are
considered as “open market” purchases under PCA Sec 9, and are, therefore, not
subject to the PCA.
html: Purchases by Army and Air Force post exchanges and Navy exchanges for a variety of reasons are considered as “open market” purchases under PCA Sec 9, and are, therefore, not subject to the PCA.
